name: Strange night: Driving back home (A Strange night series)
name_original: Strange night: Driving back home (A Strange night series)
description:
This is the beginning of my new series guys. I hope you enjoy. Let's experience the strange night story together.

What is Strange night series?

Strange night series is a 3D horror game series which mostly focused on the story of a different characters trying to survive the night in a different situations. This series also has some FNAF vibes as well.

Game created by Paulor94

All soundtrack used in this game belongs to their respective owners.

Most assets that used in the game are from Unity assets store.
